About

This is my attempt at porting the Roon theme over to Jekyll. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the official Roon theme (for Ghost) at: github.com/TryGhost/Roon/

You can find the source code my Jekyll version of Roon: github.com/vormwald/joon

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll

Enjoy!

Feed

Joon: Roon for Jekyll

http://yourdomain.com
Published with Jekyll
Source code
Roon was an excellent service, with a beautiful understated design. After being acquired by Ghost, the Roon theme was open sourced.
This is my Jekyll port of the Roon theme.
